title: Blog Fest Block Party!
itunes:title: Blog Fest Block Party!
description: Today on The Cigar Authority its a blog fest with The Devil Kid, Cigar Feed's Charlie Minato, and later the guys from Cigar Think Tank call in to give us an exclusive look back at "The Brackets." Also joining us on today's Cigar Authority is Don Decapot from the J.C. Newman Cigar Company. We're smoking the El Baton and the Padron 1926 Series. All this and more on The Cigar Authority!
